segment.source: When submitting an IAP, the options on the Pricing and availability page determine what to charge for your IAP and how it should be offered to customers.
segment.target: When submitting an IAP, the options on the Pricing and availability page determine what to charge for your IAP and how it should be offered to customers.

segment.source: Set IAP pricing and availability
segment.target: Set IAP pricing and availability

segment.source: Set IAP pricing and availability
segment.target: Set IAP pricing and availability

segment.source: When submitting an IAP, the options on the Pricing and availability page determine what to charge for your IAP and how it should be offered to customers.
segment.target: When submitting an IAP, the options on the Pricing and availability page determine what to charge for your IAP and how it should be offered to customers.

segment.source: Base price
segment.target: Base price

segment.source: You must select a base price for your IAP.
segment.target: You must select a base price for your IAP.

segment.source: These price tiers are the same as the price tiers for apps, starting at .99 USD.
segment.target: These price tiers are the same as the price tiers for apps, starting at .99 USD.

segment.source: You also have the option to offer your IAP for free.
segment.target: You also have the option to offer your IAP for free.

segment.source: Markets and custom prices
segment.target: Markets and custom prices

segment.source: By default, your IAP will be listed in all possible markets, including any future markets that we may add later, at its base price.
segment.target: By default, your IAP will be listed in all possible markets, including any future markets that we may add later, at its base price.

segment.source: However, just as with an app, you have the option to choose the markets in which you'd like to offer your IAP.
segment.target: However, just as with an app, you have the option to choose the markets in which you'd like to offer your IAP.

segment.source: In most cases you'll want to pick the same set of markets as the app, but you have the flexibility to make changes as needed.
segment.target: In most cases you'll want to pick the same set of markets as the app, but you have the flexibility to make changes as needed.

segment.source: You can also set custom prices so that you can charge different prices for the IAP in different markets.
segment.target: You can also set custom prices so that you can charge different prices for the IAP in different markets.

segment.source: For more info and a full list of the available markets, see Define pricing and market selection.
segment.target: For more info and a full list of the available markets, see Define pricing and market selection.

segment.source: Sale pricing
segment.target: Sale pricing

segment.source: If you want to offer your IAP at a reduced price for a limited period of time, you can create and schedule a sale.
segment.target: If you want to offer your IAP at a reduced price for a limited period of time, you can create and schedule a sale.

segment.source: For more info, see Put apps and IAPs on sale.
segment.target: For more info, see Put apps and IAPs on sale.

segment.source: Distribution and visibility
segment.target: Distribution and visibility

segment.source: You can determine whether your IAP should be offered for purchase to customers.
segment.target: You can determine whether your IAP should be offered for purchase to customers.

segment.source: Choose from one of the following options:
segment.target: Choose from one of the following options:

segment.source: Available for purchase. May be displayed in your app's listing: This is the default setting and is recommended unless you want to restrict access to your IAP.
segment.target: Available for purchase. May be displayed in your app's listing: This is the default setting and is recommended unless you want to restrict access to your IAP.

segment.source: Leave this option checked for IAPs that will be made available to any customer.
segment.target: Leave this option checked for IAPs that will be made available to any customer.

segment.source: Available for purchase. Not displayed in your app's listing: Choosing this option allows customers to purchase the IAP from within your app, but the IAP will not be displayed in your app's Store listing.
segment.target: Available for purchase. Not displayed in your app's listing: Choosing this option allows customers to purchase the IAP from within your app, but the IAP will not be displayed in your app's Store listing.

segment.source: Use this only when the offer is not broadly available, for example during initial periods of internal testing.
segment.target: Use this only when the offer is not broadly available, for example during initial periods of internal testing.

segment.source: No longer available for purchase.
segment.target: No longer available for purchase.

segment.source: Not displayed in your app's listing.
segment.target: Not displayed in your app's listing.

segment.source: Choosing this option means that the IAP won't be displayed in your app's listing, and no new customers may purchase the IAP.
segment.target: Choosing this option means that the IAP won't be displayed in your app's listing, and no new customers may purchase the IAP.

segment.source: However, this option is not supported for customers on Windows 8.1 or earlier.
segment.target: However, this option is not supported for customers on Windows 8.1 or earlier.

segment.source: If your app is available on Windows 8.1 or earlier, the IAP will still be available for purchase to those customers.
segment.target: If your app is available on Windows 8.1 or earlier, the IAP will still be available for purchase to those customers.

segment.source: To stop offering this IAP to customers on Windows 8.1 or earlier, you'll need to update your app to remove the code that offers the IAP, then publish a new submission for the app.
segment.target: To stop offering this IAP to customers on Windows 8.1 or earlier, you'll need to update your app to remove the code that offers the IAP, then publish a new submission for the app.

segment.source: This is recommended even if your app doesn't target Windows 8.1 or earlier; it's a better experience for your customers if you never offer them an IAP that you've opted to make unavailable.
segment.target: This is recommended even if your app doesn't target Windows 8.1 or earlier; it's a better experience for your customers if you never offer them an IAP that you've opted to make unavailable.

segment.source: Note Changing this setting and/or submitting an app update that removes the IAP doesn't affect any customers who have already purchased the IAP, regardless of their operating system.
segment.target: Note Changing this setting and/or submitting an app update that removes the IAP doesn't affect any customers who have already purchased the IAP, regardless of their operating system.
